attributes.action: To look into and bring to account what we believe to be a total abuse of the system in issuing Penalty Charge Notices and the complete contemp shown to mtorists in the procedure of appeal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As an individual that drives daily in London it is of my believe that councils are using parking regulations as a means to raising revenue. Different wardens working for the same council and all are operating under different guidelines and levels of discretion. Appeals remain unanswered, correspondence is not received and tickets are being issued in there thousands incorrectly. People are abusing the disabled badge parking all days in bays. CCTV smart cars are taking pictures of alledged offences that wardens would otherwise see are infact parked or loading/unloading correctly. Signs are not clear or do not exist where they should. And in some instances the first a motorist is informed of an offence is when they receive a letter from a bailiff. This has got to stop

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
